  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/780</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/780</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Aquest any, física: El tub que es fa invisible</string>
            <string language="en">The disappearing tube</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das verschwindene Gefäß</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le tube disparaissant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O tubo desaparecendo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il tubo sparente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο εξαφανιμένος σωλήνας</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Fitxa de la col.lecció "Aquest any, física!" que presenta un experiment sobre la refracció de la llum i els índex de refracció. La fitxa conté imatges, el guió de la pràctica i qüestions amb resposta sobre l'experiment.</string>
            <string language="en">One of the activity cards in the collection "This year, Physics!" This one is an experiment on the refraction of light and refractive indices. It includes images, instructions for the experiment and questions answers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">fenomen òptic</string>
            <string language="en">optical phenomenon</string>
            <string language="es">fenómeno óptico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">òptica</string>
            <string language="en">optics</string>
            <string language="es">óptica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">fenomen físic</string>
            <string language="en">physical phenomenon</string>
            <string language="es">fenómeno físico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">física</string>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
            <string language="es">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine der Aktivität Karten in der Ansammlung 
"dieses Jahr, Physik!" Dieses ist ein Experiment auf der 
Brechung der hellen und Brechungskoeffizienten. Es schließt 
Bilder, Anweisungen für das Experiment und Fragen Antworten ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une des cartes d'activité dans la collection 
"cette année, physique!" Celui-ci est une expérience sur la 
réfraction des indices légers et de réfraction. Il inclut des
images, des instructions pour l'expérience et des réponses de 
questions.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um dos cartões da atividade na coleção "este 
ano, física!" Este é uma experiência no refraction de 
deslocamentos predeterminados claros e refractive. Inclui 
imagens, instruções para a experiência e respostas das perguntas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una delle schedi di attività nell'accumulazione 
"questo anno, fisica!" Questo è un esperimento sulla rifrazione
degli indici di rifrazione e chiari. Include le immagini, le 
istruzioni per l'esperimento e le risposte di domande.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια από τις κάρτες δραστηριότητας στη συλλογή "αυτό 
το έτος, φυσική!" Αυτό είναι ένα πείραμα στη διάθλαση των
ελαφριών και διαθλαστικών ευρετηρίων. Περιλαμβάνει τις 
εικόνες, τις οδηγίες για το πείραμα και τις απαντήσεις ερωτήσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">optisches Phänomen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">körperliches Phänomen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">phénomène optique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">systeme optique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">phénomène physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fenômeno ótico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistema ótico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fenômeno físico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fenomeno ottico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ottica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fenomeno fisico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οπτικό φαινόμενο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οπτική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσικό φαινόμενο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσική</string>
          </keyword>
